name: part_004
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭】ポルカプロデュース!最強アイドルグループ3DLIVE! [ywvR52V7HiI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'The Immoralist'.
Minato Aqua addresses the audience and the producer about the song's difficulty.
Tokoyami Towa comments on Aqua's performance and introduces the next segment.
Tokoyami Towa performs 'As You Like It'.

subtitles.original: なんて...
subtitles.english: Saying...

subtitles.original: ...つぶやいて
subtitles.english: ...murmuring it as I go

subtitles.original: 眠るけど いつも
subtitles.english: to sleep, but always,

subtitles.original: きみの夢ばかり
subtitles.english: all I do is dream of you.

subtitles.original: どうして？わからない。
subtitles.english: Why? I don't know.

subtitles.original: なんで？なんでこんなに曲が難しいの？
subtitles.english: Why? Why is this song so difficult?

subtitles.original: ポルカプロデューサー、ポルカちゃん、
subtitles.english: Polka Producer, Polka-chan,

subtitles.original: 助けてー！
subtitles.english: Help me!

subtitles.original: あー 答えなんて出なくても
subtitles.english: Ah, even if the answer doesn't come out,

subtitles.original: 立ち向かうよ
subtitles.english: I'll face it head-on!

subtitles.original: さあこれも私の心体すべてが
subtitles.english: Come, even this, my entire heart and body,

subtitles.original: 君と出会って導き出した答え
subtitles.english: Is the answer derived from meeting you.

subtitles.original: 止まらない 止まれない 止まるつもりも
subtitles.english: Won't stop, can't stop, no intention of stopping,

subtitles.original: きみの御許にと決めたの
subtitles.english: I've decided to be by your side.

subtitles.original: きみのた今闘うの
subtitles.english: I'm fighting for you right now.

subtitles.original: だいすき
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: あいしてる
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: たとえ明日になれば
subtitles.english: Even if when tomorrow comes,

subtitles.original: 消えゆく運命でも
subtitles.english: it's my fate to fade away,

subtitles.original: わたしを止める
subtitles.english: it won't be a reason

subtitles.original: 理由にもならないよ
subtitles.english: to ever stop me.

subtitles.original: わたしきみの前なら
subtitles.english: If it's in front of you,

subtitles.original: インモラリストだよ
subtitles.english: I'm an immoralist.

subtitles.original: 君と共にギリギリのパイ
subtitles.english: Right on the edge together with you,

subtitles.original: あからさまにクラクラのパイ
subtitles.english: Blatantly dizzy and lightheaded,

subtitles.original: ラブはいつもアナーキズムのパイ
subtitles.english: Love is always an anarchic struggle,

subtitles.original: 私だけのインモラルなパイ
subtitles.english: My own personal immoral fight.

subtitles.original: あくあ様～！ごめんね難しい曲振って！
subtitles.english: Aqua-sama! Sorry for giving you such a hard song!

subtitles.original: あくあ様、あくあ様は安定ですわ。
subtitles.english: Aqua-sama, you were rock solid as always.

subtitles.original: もうね、可愛くカッコよくビシッと決めちゃって
subtitles.english: You were cute, cool, and you just nailed it!

subtitles.original: くれました！
subtitles.english: Great job!

subtitles.original: お気に召すまま
subtitles.english: As You Like It

subtitles.original: 淡々言葉を吐いた
subtitles.english: I spoke my words indifferently

subtitles.original: あんな思い出に泣いたのは
subtitles.english: That I cried over those memories

subtitles.original: 今日で終わりにしないか
subtitles.english: Why don't we end it today?

subtitles.original: ワンツーの合図を待って
subtitles.english: Waiting for the one-two signal

subtitles.original: ユーエンミー手を取り合ったのは
subtitles.english: You and me holding hands

subtitles.original: 僕の勇気ある行動
subtitles.english: Was my courageous action

subtitles.original: 立ち止まらないでいいんだからね
subtitles.english: It's okay not to stop

subtitles.original: 空々しいなこの人生
subtitles.english: This life is so hollow

subtitles.original: できないだなんて言わないでね
subtitles.english: Please don't say you can't do it

subtitles.original: 言わないでね
subtitles.english: Don't say it

subtitles.original: 今更なんて言わないでね
subtitles.english: Don't say it's too late now

subtitles.original: 僕ら今 さあさあ輪になって回り始める
subtitles.english: We're starting to go 'round in a circle now

subtitles.original: だんだん嫌になってでも好きになる
subtitles.english: Gradually growing tired of it, yet loving it

subtitles.original: ねえねえわかんないや自分会議も
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, I don't get it, even this inner debate

subtitles.original: どんどん中寄ってでも離れてく
subtitles.english: Drawing closer together, yet drifting apart

subtitles.original: パッパ音に乗って踊り始める
subtitles.english: Moving to the beat and starting to dance

subtitles.original: 散々嫌になってでも好きになる
subtitles.english: Grown weary of it, yet still loving it

subtitles.original: ねえねえわかんないやこの先ずっと
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, I won't understand, from now on

subtitles.original: 僕の心をシェイクシェイクイェイ
subtitles.english: Shake shake my heart, yeah!

subtitles.original: 正解なんてないのさ
subtitles.english: There's no such thing as a correct answer

subtitles.original: じゃあ一体どこに向かえば物語は終わりますか
subtitles.english: Then where should we head for this story to end?

subtitles.original: ワンツーの合図を待って
subtitles.english: Waiting for the one-two signal

subtitles.original: ユーエンミー手が触れ合ったのは
subtitles.english: You and me, our hands touching

subtitles.original: 僕の勇気ある行動
subtitles.english: Was my courageous action

subtitles.original: 畏まったって意味ないんだって
subtitles.english: There's no point in being so formal

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしがった夢にバイバイです
subtitles.english: Say goodbye to those shy dreams

subtitles.original: この先ずっとよろしくね
subtitles.english: From now on, let's stick together

subtitles.original: よろしくね
subtitles.english: Let's stick together

subtitles.original: 君と今 さあさあ交わって目を逸らしあう
subtitles.english: You and I, crossing paths and looking away

subtitles.original: だんだん嫌になってでも好きになる
subtitles.english: Gradually growing tired of it, yet loving it

subtitles.original: ねえねえわかんないや自分会議も
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, I don't get it, even this inner debate

subtitles.original: どんどん様になって崩れ落ちてく
subtitles.english: Taking shape, then crumbling away

subtitles.original: パッパ触れる前に消えてしまうの
subtitles.english: It vanishes before I can even touch it

subtitles.original: 散々嫌になってでも好きになる
subtitles.english: Grown weary of it, yet still loving it

subtitles.original: ねえねえわかんないやこの先ずっと
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, I won't understand, from now on

subtitles.original: わかりあえるまで僕たちは
subtitles.english: Until we can truly understand each other

subtitles.original: 今更なんて言わないでね
subtitles.english: Don't say it's too late now
